channel.title: Range Attack style
channel.description: How do i change the range attack style to where it doesent run up to people when you want to use range i want to make it that you range people from far away someone please post thxz

item.title: Range Attack style
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Ya i was looking for the attack method but i dont know what to change though cause when i look it up there is alot of things that come up thats what i dont understand.

Read full topic

item.title: Range Attack style
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Attack method, don’t make it check for the distance between you and the player you’re attacking if you have a bow. Although you’re gong to need to add sort of a following if they aren’t 8 squares (I say this as they could be off-screen to the other player) near the player they’re attacking.

Read full topic

item.title: Range Attack style

item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

Didn’t you JUST make a post like this like twice, and weren’t you told BOTH times that people are not going to spoon feed you the answer and aren’t going to help you unless you show evidence of some effort you put into solving this yourself?
